contact.intro: You are at the right place to optimize your processes, increase your energy efficiency, and equip your business with smart technologies.
contact.intro2: Fill out the form or contact us directly to meet with Taytech expertise and discuss technical details.
contact.name: Full Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully! We will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.error: Message could not be sent. Please try again later or write directly to info@taytech.com.tr.
contact.cta: Contact our team for information about Taytech products, services, or partnership opportunities.
corp.hero.title: Engineering in every detail.
corp.hero.desc: 40 years of industry expertise forms the foundation of Taytech. We manage all processes from design to production in-house, providing end-to-end solutions in electronic control and data management.
corp.rakamlar.title: Production power in numbers.
corp.rakamlar.desc: Thinking at scale requires a strong infrastructure. At Taytech, we carry out all our operations at our modern facilities in Gebze Plastikçiler Organized Industrial Zone.
corp.rakamlar.entegrasyonDesc: From design to card, from assembly to final testing — everything under one roof. This enables us to target zero defects in our quality control processes.
corp.rakamlar.makineDesc: Every part requiring precision engineering is processed with the latest technological equipment and lean management principles.
corp.rakamlar.alanDesc: A massive ecosystem where production and innovation converge.
corp.rakamlar.uretimDesc: High-capacity production center equipped with state-of-the-art machine lines and smart assembly stations.
corp.rakamlar.argeDesc: A dedicated design space where ideas turn into prototypes and prototypes into standard-setting technologies.
corp.standartlar.title: Beyond standards.
corp.standartlar.desc: Quality is not a result for Taytech; it is a starting point. We have structured all our production and management processes according to the most current global industrial standards.
corp.standartlar.mevzuatDesc: We track technical, national, and international regulations in real time. We ensure that our products and services are ready not only for today's but also for tomorrow's regulations.
corp.standartlar.denetimDesc: Our management system is regularly tested by independent auditors and internal teams. This ensures that the Taytech name always remains synonymous with "reliability".
corp.standartlar.politikaBaslik: QUALITY, ENVIRONMENT, OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY POLICY
corp.standartlar.politika1: TAY TECH, a pioneering organization in its sector that carries out Electrical Control and Distribution Devices, Heat Station, and Magnetic Filter Manufacturing activities, considers 'Excellence in Service and Production' as its most important principle.
corp.standartlar.politika2: We commit to continuously improving the integrated management system we have established in accordance with ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001 standards, and to periodically reviewing and developing the policy we have defined within this framework. In this context;
corp.standartlar.madde1: To ensure customer satisfaction by providing the best service to our customers at affordable prices and payment terms with our experienced and trained staff,
corp.standartlar.madde2: To continuously develop by closely following technology and incorporating the latest production systems and equipment into our organization,
corp.standartlar.madde3: To perform one hundred percent quality control for products produced as a result of work carried out with great care at every stage,
corp.standartlar.madde4: To carry out our activities in line with understanding the needs and expectations of relevant parties, primarily our customers, suppliers, and employees,
corp.standartlar.madde5: To carry out our activities and products at standard quality,
corp.standartlar.madde6: To comply with legal and other requirements within the scope of our activities,
corp.standartlar.madde7: To identify hazards arising from our activities, conduct risk assessments, and implement necessary corrective actions,
corp.standartlar.madde8: To prevent occupational health and safety incidents and occupational diseases,
corp.standartlar.madde9: To minimize and, if possible, eliminate the negative environmental impacts of our activities and products in line with environmental objectives,
corp.standartlar.madde10: To conduct environmental risk assessments and implement necessary corrective actions,
corp.standartlar.madde11: To prevent pollution and protect our natural resources while carrying out our activities,
corp.standartlar.madde12: To separate our waste within the waste management plan, ensure recycling, and properly dispose of non-recyclable waste,
corp.standartlar.madde13: To ensure continuous improvement by carrying out our activities in accordance with quality management principles,
corp.surdurulebilirlik.title: Sustainability and Efficiency.
corp.surdurulebilirlik.subtitle: The ability to endure.
corp.surdurulebilirlik.desc: For Taytech, sustainability is not just an environmental policy; it is the harmonious management of resources, technology, and corporate change. We are building a balanced production ecosystem that protects the needs of the future from today.
corp.surdurulebilirlik.ekonomiDesc: We merge social development and economic growth with environmental protection principles.
corp.surdurulebilirlik.yalinDesc: We build a measurable structure by defining all processes. Every improvement means less resource consumption.
corp.surdurulebilirlik.kaynakDesc: We make energy savings standard in every solution we design.
corp.surdurulebilirlik.gelecekDesc: Sustainability is not a destination for us, but a continuous journey of development.
corp.destek.title: Full support.
corp.destek.subtitle: At every step, in every solution.
corp.destek.desc: We transform our engineering experience into a consultancy service that will be by your side whenever you need it. We don't just offer products; we guarantee expert support to ensure your project operates efficiently for its lifetime.
corp.destek.danismanlikDesc: Starting from the pre-sales process, we design the most suitable technological infrastructure for your project together. We analyze your needs with our expert team and offer the most efficient solution.
corp.destek.hizliDesc: Technical support in the shortest time
corp.destek.satisSonrasiDesc: We are with you even after installation
corp.destek.kadroDesc: Our team, continuously updated with the latest technology and machinery, has the technical capability to guide you even in the most complex systems.
corp.destek.rekabetDesc: We support the success of our business partners by offering the best service with the right payment terms and competitive prices.
mega.bilgiDesc: Access all resources from a single point — technical documents, training videos, FAQs, and our expert support team.
haberler.title: News from Us
haberler.subtitle: Latest developments and announcements from Taytech
cozumler.title: Our Solutions
cozumler.desc: At Taytech, we understand the unique needs of every sector — from commercial facilities to healthcare institutions, from educational buildings to industrial boiler rooms — and provide end-to-end engineering solutions. With over 40 years of experience in heating, cooling, control, and automation, we add value to your projects.
cozumler.ticariDesc: Smart heating, cooling, and control solutions designed to maximize energy efficiency for shopping malls, office buildings, and business centers.
cozumler.topluDesc: End-to-end automation solutions for optimizing central heating and hot water systems in residential sites and complexes.
cozumler.bakimDesc: Precise temperature control and energy monitoring systems for facilities requiring uninterrupted comfort and safety.
cozumler.yeniDesc: Integrated mechanical automation and control panel solutions from infrastructure planning to commissioning for newly constructed projects.
cozumler.hastaneDesc: Highly reliable heat station and control systems for healthcare facilities where critical environmental conditions must be continuously monitored.
cozumler.kazanDesc: Efficiency improvement, energy savings, and remote monitoring solutions for high-capacity industrial boiler rooms.
cozumler.sporDesc: Special mechanical installation solutions meeting comfort and hygiene standards for sports halls, swimming pools, and entertainment centers.
cozumler.sahaDesc: Ready-made heat station and control panel solutions manufactured in factory and assembled on site for prefabricated and modular construction projects.
cozumler.egitimDesc: Energy-efficient, remotely manageable central heating and control systems for schools, universities, and campus areas.
sss.title: Frequently Asked Questions
sss.desc: Answers to the most commonly asked questions about Taytech products, solutions, and services.
sss.sorunuzDesc: Contact us if you can't find the answer you're looking for.
sss.g1.a: Taytech Automation and IT Inc. is a Turkish technology company providing end-to-end engineering solutions in heating-cooling control systems, smart control panels, heat stations, electronic controllers, IRONTRAP® magnetic filters, and Taytech Cloud remote monitoring platform.
sss.g2.a: All our production activities are carried out at our modern facilities in Gebze Plastikçiler Organized Industrial Zone, with a total area of 5,600 m². Our facility consists of a 4,750 m² production floor and an 860 m² R&D center.
sss.g3.a: Taytech holds ISO 9001:2015 Quality Management, ISO 14001:2015 Environmental Management, and ISO 45001:2018 Occupational Health and Safety certifications.
sss.g4.a: Our headquarters is in Ataşehir, Istanbul, and our factory is in Gebze, Kocaeli. Address: İnönü Mahallesi, Gebze Plastikçiler OSB, Atatürk Bulvarı No:7/2, Gebze/Kocaeli.
sss.u1.a: Smart Control Panels are electronic or electromechanical control units that enable automatic management of pump and motor systems. They are manufactured in different types such as Direct Start, Inverter, Soft Starter, and Star-Delta.
sss.u2.a: Heat stations are compact units that distribute thermal energy from central heating systems to buildings. They are offered in two main categories: Direct and Indirect.
sss.u3.q: What does the IRONTRAP® Magnetic Filter do?
sss.u3.a: The IRONTRAP® Magnetic Filter captures magnetic particles circulating in the water circuit of heating and cooling systems, maintaining system efficiency. It performs 65% better than conventional methods.
sss.u4.a: Taytech Cloud is an IoT-based platform that allows you to remotely monitor and manage all your mechanical installation systems.
sss.u5.q: In which areas are your electronic controllers used?
sss.u5.a: Our electronic controllers are offered in three main categories: Smart Industrial Controllers, Heat Station Electronic Controllers, and Underfloor Heating Controllers.
sss.u6.q: What are protective and cleaning fluids used for?
sss.u6.a: IRONTRAP® Protective Fluids protect your system against corrosion, while Cleaning Fluids remove existing deposits. These products extend the life of heating-cooling systems.
sss.t1.q: Do you offer after-sales technical support?
sss.t1.a: Yes. At Taytech, we are by your side in all processes from pre-sales consultancy to post-installation technical support.
sss.t2.q: How can I access your product technical documents?
sss.t2.a: All technical data sheets, user manuals, and catalogs are available in the Document Center section of our website.
sss.t3.q: How can I determine which products are suitable for my project?
sss.t3.a: Our engineering team offers free technical consultancy service to determine the most suitable product and system configuration for your project.
sss.t4.q: What is the warranty period for Taytech products?
sss.t4.a: Our products come with a standard 2-year warranty. All manufacturing-related defects are repaired free of charge during the warranty period.
sss.c1.q: Which sectors do you provide solutions for?
sss.c1.a: We serve a wide range of sectors including commercial facilities, residential complexes, care and nursing homes, hospitals, industrial boiler rooms, sports and leisure facilities, off-site manufacturing projects, and educational buildings.
sss.c2.q: Can I integrate Taytech products into my existing system?
sss.c2.a: Yes. Our products are designed to be compatible with existing mechanical installation infrastructures.
sss.c3.q: How long does remote monitoring system installation take?
sss.c3.a: The installation time of the Taytech Cloud platform may vary depending on the scope of the project. Please contact our team for detailed information and a timeline tailored to your project.
news.1: Taytech Was a Guest at Mas Academy
news.8: New Partnerships in Smart Building Projects
cozumler.ticari.p1: Commercial facilities are structures that require special engineering solutions with high energy consumption and complex mechanical infrastructure. Energy costs constitute a significant portion of total operating expenses in shopping malls, office towers, and business centers.
cozumler.ticari.p2: At Taytech, we maximize energy efficiency with central heating and cooling control systems, building automation integrations, and remote monitoring solutions developed specifically for commercial facilities.
cozumler.ticari.neden: With over 40 years of industry experience, ISO-certified production processes, and our end-to-end engineering approach, we increase the energy efficiency of your commercial facilities while reducing operating costs.
cozumler.toplu.p1: Residential complex projects require meeting the heating and hot water needs of hundreds or even thousands of independent units from a single center. Distribution balance, individual consumption measurement, and energy efficiency are critically important in systems of this scale.
cozumler.toplu.p2: Taytech provides end-to-end solutions from central heat stations to in-unit distribution systems in residential complex projects. We protect water quality with IRONTRAP® magnetic filters while precisely managing each unit's heat consumption with our electronic controllers.
cozumler.bakim.p1: Care and nursing homes are special facilities that require uninterrupted and precise temperature control due to the health conditions of their residents. Even small fluctuations in ambient temperature can pose serious health risks for elderly and care-dependent individuals.
cozumler.bakim.p2: Taytech offers highly reliable heating control systems, automatic backup mechanisms, and 24/7 remote monitoring solutions for these sensitive facilities.
cozumler.yeni.h2: With You from Day One of Your Project
cozumler.yeni.p1: Proper planning of mechanical installation infrastructure in newly constructed projects forms the foundation for the building to operate efficiently throughout its entire lifetime.
cozumler.yeni.p2: Taytech's engineering team provides technical consultancy throughout all processes from project-based feasibility studies to specification preparation, from production to commissioning.
cozumler.hastane.p1: Hospitals are structures that contain critical areas such as operating rooms, intensive care units, and sterilization areas. The slightest deviation in temperature and humidity control in these areas directly affects patient safety.
cozumler.hastane.p2: Taytech develops solutions with redundant pump control panels, automatic switchover systems, and real-time monitoring through Taytech Cloud for healthcare facilities.
cozumler.kazan.p1: Industrial boiler rooms are the heart of factories, production facilities, and large-scale heating centers. Safe and efficient management of systems operating with high pressure, high temperature, and large flow values requires expert engineering knowledge.
cozumler.kazan.p2: Taytech extends system life and reduces fuel consumption with specially designed control panels, cascade boiler management systems, and IRONTRAP® magnetic filters for industrial boiler rooms.
cozumler.spor.p1: Sports halls, swimming pools, SPA centers, and entertainment facilities are complex structures requiring different temperature zones, high humidity control, and large amounts of hot water production.
cozumler.spor.p2: Taytech offers solutions tailored to the multi-zone climate control needs of these facilities. We minimize energy costs by protecting water quality with heat recovery systems, pool heating control panels, and IRONTRAP® products.
cozumler.saha.h2: From Factory to Site: Ready Modular Solutions
cozumler.saha.p1: Off-site manufacturing is one of the most efficient approaches in the modern construction industry. Manufacturing heat stations and control panels in a controlled factory environment increases quality consistency.
cozumler.saha.p2: Taytech offers plug-and-play convenience for your projects by manufacturing prefabricated heat stations and ready-made control panels at our modern facilities in Gebze.
cozumler.egitim.p1: Schools, universities, and campuses require complex heating and air conditioning infrastructure as multi-building structures spread across large areas.
cozumler.egitim.p2: Taytech offers solutions that enable the management of the entire campus from a single screen with central boiler room automation, building-based heat stations, and the Taytech Cloud platform for educational buildings.

prod.manyetik.title: IRONTRAP® Magnetic Filter
prod.manyetik.desc: IronTrap magnetic filters designed to protect against corrosion and magnetite are integrated with an automatic air vent. Air is a catalyst, therefore it causes corrosion development in heating and cooling systems. Air entering the system during commissioning and draining is expelled from the system through the automatic air vent. While the system is running, the air in the fluid passing through the IronTrap magnetic filter is expelled through the automatic air vent.
prod.manyetik.feat2: 35% better performance in recovering system efficiency
prod.manyetik.feat4: Powerful Neodymium magnets are easy to remove and install
prod.manyetik.feat5: Provides simple operation with easy installation
prod.manyetik.feat6: Manufactured in compliance with pressure vessels regulations
prod.manyetik.tech6: BODY - Air Vent: Automatic air vent 1/2"
prod.manyetik.adv2: Reduces Early Failure and High Maintenance Costs
prod.manyetik.adv3: Extends the Service Life of System Equipment
prod.manyetik.adv5: High Performance Magnetic Bars Capture Even the Smallest Magnetic Particles
prod.manyetik.adv7: Provides Fast Cleaning Thanks to Vacuum Valve
prod.cloud.title: Taytech Cloud
prod.cloud.dataloger.desc: DS-YK Datalogger/Gateway is a smart data collection device used to collect and record meter data from M-Bus converters and transfer them to remote services / cloud applications via wired/wireless network or GPRS modem.
prod.cloud.dataloger.feat1: Has smart, fast and flexible data collection/evaluation capability thanks to its high-performance processor, large memory and embedded operating system
prod.cloud.dataloger.feat2: Can connect with various brand/model M-Bus converters with RS232, RS485 and Ethernet interfaces compatible with EN1434
prod.cloud.dataloger.feat3: Provides access to remote database / cloud with internal Ethernet / WiFi connection and external GPRS connection options
prod.cloud.dataloger.feat4: DS-YK02 model can read from 8 M-Bus blocks with a single converter
prod.cloud.dataloger.feat5: Connection kit options available for different mounting options
prod.cloud.gsm.desc: DS-GM01 is a smart GPRS modem used for data transfer from RS232 or RS485 connected devices to remote servers via GPRS connection.
prod.cloud.gsm.feat1: Flexible connection with industrial devices thanks to built-in microcontroller and RS232/RS485 connection
prod.cloud.mbus.desc: Transfers data from devices connected on the Mbus line to the computer environment via RS232 and USB interface for data analysis and processing.
prod.cloud.mbus.feat1: Can connect to meters through more than 1 converter with repeater feature
prod.cloud.mbus.feat2: Offers easy meter connection with two different entry points for up to 250 meters
prod.cloud.mbus.feat3: Provides data transfer with computer through RS232 communication
prod.cloud.mbus.feat4: Offers direct computer connection through USB interface (Optional)
prod.cloud.mbus.feat5: Switches to protection mode in case of any short circuit or possible high current thanks to current protection and shuts down the mbus line
prod.cloud.mbus.feat6: Informs the user through visual indicators on the panel: Power, RX, TX, USB, Overcurrent
prod.cloud.mbus.feat7: Offers rail and wall mounting connection with flexible connection
prod.cloud.mbus.feat8: Gives audible warning to the user in case of overcurrent thanks to the audible indicator on the hardware
prod.cloud.mbus.feat9: Enables easy installation thanks to wide range connection diameters

prod.isi.kontrolorleri.title: Heat Station Controllers
prod.isi.d.thermohexa.desc: In ThermoHexa heat stations, control is performed thermostatically, i.e., depending on temperature. Domestic hot water preparation and heating take place simultaneously. Thanks to the Thermostatic Valve inside ThermoHexa that responds very quickly to temperature changes, the possibility of heat loss is reduced. Thanks to its compact design, the device is practical and easy to install. The heat exchangers and pipes inside ThermoHexa are made of AISI 316 grade stainless steel, allowing use even with aluminum radiators.
prod.isi.d.thermohexa-ufh.desc: In ThermoHexa underfloor heating heat stations, control is performed thermostatically, i.e., depending on temperature. Domestic hot water preparation and heating take place simultaneously. Thanks to the Thermostatic Valve inside ThermoHexa that responds very quickly to temperature changes, the possibility of heat loss is reduced. Thanks to its compact design, the device is practical and easy to install. The heat exchangers and pipes inside ThermoHexa are made of AISI 316 grade stainless steel, allowing use even with aluminum radiators. ThermoHexa includes a mixing circuit to keep the underfloor heating line temperature stable. The zone valve inside the heat station allows adjustment of the flow rate going into the apartment. An actuator can be easily adapted onto the zone valve. Thus, when the room thermostat is off, the actuator closes the underfloor heating circuit, preventing energy waste.
prod.isi.d.hydrohexa.desc: In HydroHexa heat stations, control is performed both hydraulically and thermostatically. Since the system works with cold heat exchanger logic, the possibility of limescale formation inside the heat exchanger is eliminated. HydroHexa heat stations have domestic hot water priority. Thanks to HydroHexa's low return water feature, it can work efficiently with condensing boilers. The heat exchangers and pipes inside HydroHexa are made of AISI 316 grade stainless steel, allowing use even with aluminum radiators. Complete balancing can be achieved within the apartment thanks to the differential pressure valve on the boiler return line and the zone valve on the heating return line.
prod.isi.d.hydrohexa-ufh.desc: In HydroHexa underfloor heating heat stations, control is performed both hydraulically and thermostatically. Since the system works with cold heat exchanger logic, the possibility of limescale formation inside the heat exchanger is eliminated. HydroHexa heat stations have domestic hot water priority. Thanks to HydroHexa's low return water feature, it can work efficiently with condensing boilers. The heat exchangers and pipes inside HydroHexa are made of AISI 316 grade stainless steel, allowing use even with aluminum radiators. Complete balancing can be achieved within the apartment thanks to the differential pressure valve on the boiler return line and the zone valve on the heating return line. HydroHexa includes a mixing circuit to keep the underfloor heating line temperature stable. The zone valve inside the heat station allows adjustment of the flow rate going into the apartment. An actuator can be easily adapted onto the zone valve. Thus, when the room thermostat is off, the actuator closes the underfloor heating circuit, preventing energy waste.
prod.isi.i.indirect-hydrohexa.desc: In HydroHexa heat stations, control is performed both hydraulically and thermostatically. Since the system works with cold heat exchanger logic, the possibility of limescale formation inside the heat exchanger is eliminated. HydroHexa heat stations have domestic hot water priority. Thanks to HydroHexa's low return water feature, it can work efficiently with condensing boilers. The heat exchangers and pipes inside HydroHexa are made of AISI 316 grade stainless steel, allowing use even with aluminum radiators. Complete balancing can be achieved within the apartment thanks to the differential pressure valve on the boiler return line and the zone valve on the heating return line. The Indirect series HydroHexa serves as a pressure breaker in high-rise buildings, enabling the removal of mechanical rooms between floors and the commercial use of these areas. Heating is operated as a closed system with a separate heat exchanger circuit. Optionally, outdoor air compensation control can also be added to control apartment heating.
prod.isi.i.indirect-thermohexa.desc: In ThermoHexa heat stations, control is performed thermostatically, i.e., depending on temperature. Domestic hot water preparation and heating take place simultaneously. Thanks to the Thermostatic Valve inside ThermoHexa that responds very quickly to temperature changes, the possibility of heat loss is reduced. Thanks to its compact design, the device is practical and easy to install. The heat exchangers and pipes inside ThermoHexa are made of AISI 316 grade stainless steel, allowing use even with aluminum radiators. The Indirect series ThermoHexa serves as a pressure breaker in high-rise buildings, enabling the removal of mechanical rooms between floors and the commercial use of these areas. Heating is operated as a closed system with a separate heat exchanger circuit. Optionally, outdoor air compensation control can also be added to control apartment heating.
prod.isi.i.smart-hexa.desc: In SmartHexa heat stations, control is performed both hydraulically and thermostatically. Since the system works with cold heat exchanger logic, the possibility of limescale formation inside the heat exchanger is eliminated. SmartHexa heat stations have domestic hot water priority. SmartHexa measures temperature, pressure, and flow values through the heat station. Thus, energy metering is achieved at the heat station. Additionally, data measured by SmartHexa can be transmitted to the end user via GSM or Ethernet. Thanks to SmartHexa's low return water feature, it can work efficiently with condensing boilers. The heat exchangers and pipes inside SmartHexa are made of AISI 316 grade stainless steel, allowing use even with aluminum radiators. The Indirect series SmartHexa serves as a pressure breaker in high-rise buildings, enabling the removal of mechanical rooms between floors and the commercial use of these areas. Heating is operated as a closed system with a separate heat exchanger circuit. Optionally, outdoor air compensation control can also be added to control apartment heating.

prod.smartEnd.grinder.desc: Microprocessor-based smart controllers control the system for up to 2 pumps in single-phase or three-phase configuration. The Smart Grinder controller allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically.
prod.smartEnd.hidrofor.desc: Microprocessor-based smart controllers control the system for up to 2 pumps in single-phase or three-phase configuration. The Smart Booster Controller allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically. (Performs pressurization processes in clean water applications)
prod.smartEnd.atik-su.desc: Microprocessor-based smart controllers control the system for up to 2 pumps in single-phase or three-phase configuration. The Smart Wastewater controller allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically. (Performs filling and draining processes in wastewater applications)
prod.smartEnd.derin-kuyu.desc: The microprocessor-based smart controller controls the system for up to 2 pumps in single-phase or three-phase configuration. The Smart Bore Hole controller allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically. (Performs filling and draining processes in wastewater and clean water applications)
prod.smartEnd.grinder.feat1: Smart Grinder Panels are mounted in a specially designed box made of water-resistant IP 55 ABS material
prod.smartEnd.grinder.feat2: Remote system operation, data viewing and system control via 3G / WI-FI module
prod.smartEnd.grinder.feat3: Easy and quick settings via clearly readable LCD screen using navigation buttons
prod.smartEnd.grinder.feat4: Opens, runs and stops the system with information from float switches or level electrodes
prod.smartEnd.hidrofor.feat1: Remote system operation, data viewing and system control via 3G / WI-FI module
prod.smartEnd.hidrofor.feat2: Easy and quick settings via clearly readable LCD screen using navigation buttons
prod.smartEnd.hidrofor.feat3: Starting or stopping the motor with different types of connections; pressure switch, flow switch, etc.
prod.smartEnd.atik-su.feat1: Remote system operation, data viewing and system control via 3G / WI-FI module

prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.desc: With its easy-to-understand menu, it allows the user to set the desired temperature and time parameters and analyze multiple parameters on a single screen. Thanks to its high-speed processor frequency and software algorithm, it processes information from sensors and provides fast control.
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.desc: Thanks to its 32-bit microprocessor, it analyzes information from sensors and meets the user's heating and domestic hot water needs. Control switches allow easy setting of temperature and time.
prod.isiKontrol.de10.desc: DE10 Junction box controls the heating line in heat stations under user control.
prod.isiKontrol.de15.desc: DE15 Junction box controls the heating of two independent zones in heat stations under user control.
prod.isiKontrol.de20.desc: DE20 Junction box controls the heating line and domestic hot water line in heat stations based on the flow rate passing through the station and regional heating needs.
prod.isiKontrol.de25.desc: DE25 Junction box controls the heating line and domestic hot water line in heat stations based on information from the NTC temperature sensor and flow switch through the user interface.
prod.isiKontrol.de30.desc: Controls 7 zones independently based on contact information from 230V room thermostats and protects the pump against dry running at low pressures via pressure switch.
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat1: Controls the temperature in the domestic hot water line with NTC temperature sensor
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat2: Controls heating needs with room thermostat connection and ensures pump operation
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat3: Shows the flow rate passing through the heat station to the user with flow sensor and takes action based on this information
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat4: Collects temperature sensor data from 4 different points
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat5: Provides valve and pump control through 4 different PWM outputs
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat6: Provides On/Off pump and valve control through dry contact output
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat7: Provides tactile feedback to the user through the membrane label on the panel
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat8: Presents information received from sensors to the user on the 128*64 graphic display
prod.isiKontrol.ess-86.feat9: Provides waterproofing with IP65 enclosure and fitting connections
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat1: Provides protection in case of pump seizure through glass fuse
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat2: Controls the temperature in the domestic hot water line with NTC temperature sensor
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat3: Controls heating needs with room thermostat connection and ensures pump operation
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat4: Adapts to systems with flow switch or flow sensor option
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat5: Closes the heating line based on flow information, directing hot water to the domestic hot water line
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat6: Controls the recirculation line based on temperature and time
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat7: Sets the desired temperature and time values through DIP switches on the hardware
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat8: Controls valves and pumps in the system through normally open and normally closed contact outputs
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat9: Allows On/Off control of heating and recirculation lines through buttons on the panel
prod.isiKontrol.chs18.feat10: Provides waterproofing with IP65 enclosure and fitting connections
prod.isiKontrol.de10.feat2: Enables remote regional operation of the pump in the station
prod.isiKontrol.de10.feat3: Provides protection in case of pump seizure through glass fuse
prod.isiKontrol.de10.feat4: Enables regional operation through room thermostat connection
prod.isiKontrol.de10.feat5: Provides waterproofing with IP65 enclosure and fitting connections

prod.isiKontrol.de15.feat3: Enables actuator operation on the collector line for the zone that needs heating through two different room thermostat connections

prod.isiKontrol.de20.feat2: Visual indicators on the panel show whether the heating or domestic hot water line is operating
prod.isiKontrol.de20.feat3: Controls 230V AC NC/NO valves that control heating and recirculation lines in the system
prod.isiKontrol.de20.feat4: Stops the heating line through the flow switch in the system to prioritize user comfort
prod.isiKontrol.de20.feat5: Controls the heating line through the room thermostat connection inside the panel
prod.isiKontrol.de20.feat6: Provides waterproofing with IP65 enclosure and fitting connections
prod.isiKontrol.de25.feat1: Provides protection in case of pump seizure through glass fuse
prod.isiKontrol.de25.feat2: Allows setting the desired temperature in the recirculation line through the controller on the junction box
prod.isiKontrol.de25.feat3: Measures the temperature value of the connected line through NTC temperature sensor
prod.isiKontrol.de25.feat4: Runs the pump connected to the recirculation line for the time set on the panel and stops when the time expires
prod.isiKontrol.de25.feat5: Stops the heating line through the flow switch in the system to prioritize user comfort
prod.isiKontrol.de25.feat6: Controls the heating line through the room thermostat connection inside the panel
prod.isiKontrol.de30.feat1: Provides protection in case of pump seizure through glass fuse
prod.isiKontrol.de30.feat2: Supports 7 independent zone room thermostat connections
prod.isiKontrol.de30.feat3: Protects the pump against dry running at low pressures through pressure switch connection
prod.isiKontrol.de30.feat4: Enables automatic pump operation based on run command from any of the 7 zones
prod.isiKontrol.de30.feat6: Provides waterproofing with IP65 enclosure and fitting connections
prod.yerden.t-box.desc: T-Box offers timer room thermostats for 6 independent zones and 2 actuator connections for each zone. Provides time-controlled control through digital room thermostat connection.
prod.yerden.t-box.feat1: Provides protection in case of pump seizure through glass fuse
prod.yerden.t-box.feat2: Can be easily added to the system with compatibility for 230V AC / 24V DC systems
prod.yerden.t-box.feat4: Offers two different valve connections for each zone. Thus, 12 valve connections can be made
prod.yerden.t-box.feat5: Enables automatic pump activation when any of the 6 zones needs heating through the relay output on the controller
prod.yerden.t-box.feat6: Directs the temperature to the zone in need during pump operation
prod.yerden.t-box.feat7: Offers easy installation through spring-loaded terminals
prod.yerden.t-box.feat8: Offers the ability to operate according to two different programs set through timed room thermostat connections
prod.temizleyici.tc200.desc: Used to clean magnetite and sludge in currently operating systems. The advanced powerful cleaner TC200+ increases heat efficiency by ensuring water flow in radiator and pipe installations.
prod.temizleyici.tc210.desc: An ideal fluid for newly installed and systems to be commissioned. Its powerful formula is specially developed to keep residues away from the system.
prod.temizleyici.tc220.desc: TC220+ is specially designed with its powerful formula to remove limescale and hardened residues in heating systems. It is a cleaner and descaler.
prod.temizleyici.tc200.feat2: Cleans sludge, sediment and deposits from the system
prod.temizleyici.tc210.feat1: Cleans installation residues and oils on metal surfaces
prod.temizleyici.tc210.feat2: Removes rust-causing limescale residues from the system
prod.temizleyici.tc210.feat3: Prepares the system for inhibitor protection
prod.temizleyici.tc220.feat4: Can be used on all metals
prod.koruyucu.tp100.desc: With its powerful and effective formula, it stops the formation of magnetite and other deposits caused by wear and tear in the system. It protects the central system and ensures efficient boiler operation. It helps extend the system's lifespan.
prod.koruyucu.tp120.desc: With its biocide formulation, it combats the accumulation of algae and biological residues. It protects the system against bacterial formation. It is effective with its powerful formula in preventing problems that occur in underfloor heating and cooling systems.
prod.koruyucu.tp130.desc: TP130+ is a fluid developed to protect heating and cooling systems against freezing. Thanks to the preservatives it contains, it protects the system from corrosion and limescale formation. It provides effective protection in central systems not only in cold weather but under all conditions.
prod.koruyucu.tp130.feat1: Prevents water from freezing in central heating
prod.koruyucu.tp130.feat5: Ensures effective and fast heat transfer
prod.directStart.smart-box.desc: Microcontroller-based Control Panels are designed to control single-phase pumps. Smart Box allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically. It performs draining or filling operations for clean water applications.
prod.directStart.smart-booster.desc: Smart Booster is a microcontroller-based control panel developed for booster pump systems. It provides constant pressure control in single or dual pump systems. It offers professional water pressurization solutions with advanced protection features and user-friendly interface.
prod.directStart.smart-wastewater.desc: Smart Wastewater is a microcontroller-based control panel developed for wastewater and sewage pump systems. It provides safe and efficient wastewater drainage in single or dual pump systems. It offers professional wastewater management with overflow protection and level control.
prod.directStart.smart-bore-hole.desc: Microprocessor-based control panels control the system for up to 2 pumps in single-phase or three-phase configuration. Smart Bore Hole allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically. It performs filling and draining processes in wastewater and clean water applications.
prod.directStart.smart-grinder.desc: Microprocessor-based control panels control the system for up to 2 pumps in single-phase or three-phase configuration. Smart Grinder allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically.
prod.directStart.smart-exclusive-d.desc: Microprocessor-based control panels control the system for up to 4 pumps in single-phase or three-phase configuration. Smart Exclusive D allows you to manage your system, change parameters, record events and messages, and perform many other operations practically. It is applicable for pressurization, draining, and filling operations in wastewater and clean water applications.

prod.dogrudanEM.direct-start.desc: A control panel with direct starting method that can simultaneously drive up to 4 pumps with 1 or 3-phase motors. Designed for filling, draining and pressurization operations in clean water and wastewater applications.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protecting your personal data is our priority.
privacy.s1.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.s1.p1: As Taytech Automation and IT Inc. ("Taytech"), we are committed to protecting the privacy of our website visitors. This Privacy Policy explains how your personal data is collected, used, stored, and protected. By using our website, you are deemed to have accepted the terms set out in this policy.
privacy.s2.title: 2. Personal Data Collected
privacy.s2.p1: The following personal data may be collected through our website:
privacy.s2.li5: Message content submitted through contact forms
privacy.s3.title: 3. Purposes of Data Use
privacy.s3.p1: The personal data we collect is used for the following purposes:
privacy.s3.li2: Providing information about our products and services
privacy.s3.li3: Offering technical support and after-sales services
privacy.s3.li4: Improving website experience and conducting analysis
privacy.s4.title: 4. Cookies
privacy.s4.p1: Our website may use cookies to improve user experience. Cookies are small text files stored in your browser. Essential functionality cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Analytics cookies help us understand site usage. You can manage your cookie preferences from your browser settings; however, disabling some cookies may affect site functionality.
privacy.s5.title: 5. Data Sharing
privacy.s5.p1: Your personal data is not shared with third parties except as required by law. Your data may only be shared to the minimum extent necessary with our business partners (hosting provider, email service provider, etc.) in order to provide our services. These business partners are also obligated to protect your data.
privacy.s6.title: 6. Data Security
privacy.s6.p1: We implement industry-standard technical and administrative measures to ensure the security of your personal data. Your data is protected through SSL encryption, firewalls, and access control mechanisms. However, no data transmission over the internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.
privacy.s7.title: 7. Your Rights (KVKK)
privacy.s7.p1: Under the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK) No. 6698, you have the following rights:
privacy.s7.li1: To learn whether your personal data is being processed
privacy.s7.li2: To request information if your data has been processed
privacy.s7.li3: To learn the purpose of processing your personal data and whether they are used in accordance with their purpose
privacy.s7.li4: To request correction or deletion of your personal data
privacy.s7.li5: To object to the processing of your personal data
privacy.s8.title: 8. Contact
privacy.s8.p1: For questions about our privacy policy or requests regarding your personal data, you can contact us:
terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms before using our website.
terms.s1.title: 1. General Provisions
terms.s1.p1: This website is operated by Taytech Automation and IT Inc. ("Taytech"). By accessing and using our website, you declare that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms of Use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our website.
terms.s2.title: 2. Use of Services
terms.s2.p1: Our website is designed to provide information about Taytech products, solutions, and services. You may use the site content only for legal and legitimate purposes. Unauthorized copying, distribution, or commercial use of the content is prohibited. Using our website to spread any malicious software or to gain unauthorized access to the site is strictly prohibited.
terms.s3.title: 3. Intellectual Property Rights
terms.s3.p1: All content, designs, logos, texts, images, graphics, software, and other materials on our website are the intellectual property of Taytech and are protected under Turkish Intellectual Property Law and international agreements. IRONTRAP® is a registered trademark. Any reproduction, distribution, or use of these materials without Taytech's written permission is prohibited.
terms.s4.title: 4. Product and Service Information
terms.s4.p1: Product information, technical specifications, and prices on our website are subject to change without prior notice. While Taytech makes every effort to ensure the accuracy of information on the website, it does not guarantee that the information is complete and error-free. We recommend that you review our current technical documents and contact our sales team before making purchasing decisions.
terms.s5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
terms.s5.p1: Taytech does not guarantee that the website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or virus-free. Taytech shall not be held liable for direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of the website. Links to third-party websites are provided solely for convenience, and Taytech is not responsible for the content of these sites.
terms.s6.title: 6. Warranty and Return Policy
terms.s6.p1: Taytech products come with a standard 2-year warranty. All manufacturing-related defects are repaired free of charge during the warranty period. For situations not covered by the warranty (user error, unauthorized intervention, natural disasters, etc.), please contact our sales team for detailed information. Product return and exchange requests must be made within 14 days from the date of delivery.
terms.s7.title: 7. Privacy
terms.s7.p1: For detailed information about the protection of your personal data, please review our page:
terms.s8.title: 8. Changes
terms.s8.p1: Taytech reserves the right to change these Terms of Use at any time without prior notice. Changes take effect on the date they are published on the website. Your continued use of our website means that you accept the updated terms.
terms.s9.title: 9. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
terms.s9.p1: These Terms of Use are subject to the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Kocaeli Courts and Enforcement Offices shall have jurisdiction over any disputes arising from these terms.
terms.s10.title: 10. Contact
terms.s10.p1: For questions about our terms of use, you can contact us:
